resources.string: Switch NoKill option on or off
Switched on it will prevent the unit from killing all apps on going into deep-sleep
Switch Channel 4 (alarm) option on or off
Switched on it will prevent the unit from muting channel 4. This will enable voice feedback from Google Voice. It will also generate noise when no other channel is active.
Block Joying volume control and enable volume control over USB DAC.

It stops Joying\'s software from changing any of the volumes and it also allows Joying\'s physical volume knob/buttons to change Android\'s media volume which in turn should allow usb dacs to work as intended.
Settings for the different application hardware keys
BT_PHONE Key: String to be used
MEDIA Key: String to be used
MODE_SRC Key: String to be used
BAND Key: String to be used
NAVI Key: String to be used
DVD Key: String to be used
EJECT Key: String to be used
EQ Key: String to be used
Settings that determine what to do when the contact/unit is switched ON or OFF; or when coming out of resume.
What to do when contact is switched on (ACC_ON)
What to do when contact is switched off (ACC_OFF)
What to do when the unit is coming out of resume
Settings for the different system hardware keys (BE CAREFUL!)
Joying doesn\'t use default android HOME call intent, but calls their own default laucher.
HOME Key: String to be used
Be careful(!) as this overrides the default android onBackPressed() function for every (!) application
BACK Key: String to be used
